gurmukhi: iGrXo dYq sYxM ] ijmM rudR mYxM ]
transliteration: Ghiryo Dait Sainan|| Jiman Rudra Mainan||
translation: Ram was surrounded by the forces of demons like Shiva by the forces of Cupid (Kamdev).

gurmukhi: ruky rwm jMgM ] mno isMD gMgM ]75]
transliteration: Rouke Raam Janadg|| Mano Sindh Gadgadg||75||
translation: Ram tarried there for war like Ganges on meeting the ocean.75.

gurmukhi: rxM rwm b`jy ] DuxM myG l`jy ]
transliteration: Ranan Raam Bajje|| Dhounan Megh Lajje||
translation: Ram shouted so loudly in the war that the clouds felt shy;

gurmukhi: ruly q`C mu`CM ] igry sUr sÍ`CM ]76]
transliteration: Rule Tachchh Mouchchhan|| Gire Soor Svachchhan||76||
translation: The warriors rolled in dust and mighty heroes fell on the earth.76.

gurmukhi: clY AYNT mu`CY ] khwN rwm pu`CY ]
transliteration: Chalai Ainth Mouchchhai|| Kahaan Raam Pouchchhai||
translation: Subadhu and Marich began to search for Ram, while twisting their whiskers,

gurmukhi: AbY AwiQ lwgy ] khw jwhu Bwgy ]77]
transliteration: Abai Aath(i) Laage|| Kahaa Jaahu Bhaage||77||
translation: And said, “Where will he go and save himself, we will catch him just now.”77.

gurmukhi: irpM pyK rwmM ] hTXo Drm DwmM ]
transliteration: Ripan Pekh Raamannd|| Hathyo Dharam Dhaamannd||
translation: Seeing the enemies Ram became persistent and serious,

gurmukhi: krY nYx rwqM ] Dnur byd gXwqM ]78]
transliteration: Darai Nain Raatan|| Dhanur Bed Gyaatan||78||
translation: And the eyes of that knower of the science of archery, reddened.78.
The bow of Ram raised a terrible sound and showered a volley of arrows.

gurmukhi: hxI s`qR sYxM ] hsy dyv gYxM ]79]
translation: The armies of the enemy were being destroyed, seeing which the gods smiled in heaven.79.

gurmukhi: BjI srb sYxM ] lKI mRIc nYxM ]
translation: Marich saw his army running away,

gurmukhi: iPirXo ros pRyrXo ] mno swp CyVXo ]80]
transliteration: Phiriyo Ros Preryo|| Mano Saap Chedyo||80||
translation: And challenged his forces in great ire like the rage of a snake.80.

gurmukhi: hxXo rwm bwxM ] krXo isMD pXwxM ]
transliteration: Hanyo Raam Baanan|| Daryo Sindh Pyaanan||
translation: Ram discharge his arrow towards Marich, who ran towards the sea.

gurmukhi: qjXo rwj dysM ] lXo jog BysM ]81]
transliteration: Tajyo Raaj Desan|| Layo Jog Bhesan||81||
translation: He adopted the garb of a Yogi, abandoning his kingdom and country.81.
